channel.title: Help me with DC when die
channel.description: I have good server for now, can hold 100 people with no lag or crash, but i have problem, when someone go to PVP area and someone kill someone else the other one who died get d and log in back and he keep hi items and his items in floor, its kinda dupe!! how i fix it so if someone die he will not get disconnected?
